item.title: 中国率先出台全球首项安全政策：禁止汽车隐藏式车门把手
item.description: 中国禁止电动汽车使用隐藏式门把手，成为全球首个禁止这种设计的主管部门。该设计由特斯拉公司推广普及，如今因多起致命事故而面临全球监管审查。【原文：China banned concealed door handles on electric vehicles, the first country in the world to outlaw a design popularized by Tesla Inc. that is now facing global regulatory scrutiny due to a spate of deadly incidents.】

item.title: 甲骨文启动美元债券发售，投身人工智能融资热潮
item.description: 甲骨文公司已启动美元债券发行计划，这家软件巨头计划通过债务与股权销售相结合的方式筹集450亿至500亿美元资金，用于扩建云基础设施容量。【原文：Oracle Corp. has kicked off a US dollar bond offering as the software giant looks to raise $45 billion to $50 billion through a combination of debt and equity sales to build additional cloud infrastructure capacity.】

item.title: 纽约市交通局宣布斥资120亿美元更新老旧列车和巴士
item.description: 纽约市公共交通系统——全美规模最大的交通网络——正组建新部门，主导一项耗资120亿美元的计划，旨在更换使用数十年的列车并实现公交车队的现代化升级。【原文：New York City’s transit system, the largest in the US, is creating a new unit to steer a $12 billion effort to replace decades-old trains and modernize its bus fleet.】

item.title: 重组领域巨头联手推出Ensis Partners
item.description: 重组领域重量级人物马克·布施曼和理查德·辛德已创立一家新咨询公司，专门为陷入财务困境的中高端市场企业提供服务。【原文：Restructuring heavyweights Mark Buschmann and Richard Shinder have started a new advisory firm targeting upper-middle market companies in financial distress.】

item.title: 摩根大通称人工智能引领家族办公室投资主题
item.description: 摩根大通私人银行的一项调查显示，人工智能已成为全球家族办公室投资的首要选择，但实际配置比例仍相对滞后，且主要集中于公开市场股票。【原文：Artificial intelligence tops the investment priority list for family offices globally, a survey from JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s private bank shows, though allocations lag and remain concentrated in public equities.】

item.title: 欧盟考虑在新的制裁中禁止俄罗斯铜和铂金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，欧盟正考虑禁止俄罗斯进口多种铂族金属和铜，作为针对莫斯科对乌克兰发动战争的新制裁措施之一。【原文：The European Union is considering to ban Russian imports of several platinum group metals and copper as part of new sanctions targeting Moscow for its war against Ukraine, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷无意进入全球债务市场，卡普托表示
item.description: 阿根廷经济部长路易斯·卡普托周一表示，在政府能够以较低利率获得替代性融资渠道的情况下，阿根廷不计划在全球债务市场发行债券。【原文：Argentina doesn’t plan to sell bonds on global debt markets while the government can access alternative funding sources at lower interest rates, Economy Minister Luis Caputo said Monday.】

item.title: 软件行业低迷致使又一笔杠杆贷款交易搁浅
item.description: 德国医疗软件公司Dedalus暂停了一笔13亿欧元（约合15亿美元）的杠杆贷款交易，因投资者日益担忧该行业众多企业正面临人工智能发展带来的生存挑战。【原文：German healthcare software company Dedalus paused a €1.3 billion ($1.5 billion) leveraged loan deal amid rising investor unease around the existential challenge many firms in the sector face from developments in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 尽管紧张局势缓解，伊朗石油风险依然存在
item.description: 原油价格在华盛顿与德黑兰关系有望缓和的预期中下跌，但军事行动的可能性并未消失。【原文：Crude prices have dropped amid hopes of a thaw between Washington and Tehran, but the prospect of military action hasn’t disappeared.】

item.title: 印度将合并主要电力贷款机构以助力经济繁荣的电气化进程
item.description: 印度正寻求合并其两大电力公用事业贷款机构，以助力释放该国能源领域价值数千亿美元的投资。【原文：India is seeking to merge two of its biggest power utility lenders to help unlock investments worth hundreds of billions in the nation’s energy sector.】

item.title: 德国逮捕五人，涉违反制裁向俄罗斯出口商品
item.description: 德国联邦检察官下令逮捕五名男子，指控其违反欧盟制裁规定，向俄罗斯出口价值至少3000万欧元（约合3600万美元）的商品。【原文：Germany’s federal prosecutor ordered the arrest of five men for allegedly exporting goods worth at least €30 million ($36 million) to Russia in breach of European Union sanctions.】

item.title: 英格兰银行寻求绕开银行卡推进支付体系改革，布里登如是说
item.description: 英格兰银行正考虑取消银行卡支付，通过启用银行直接转账或使用代币化存款及稳定币来降低零售交易成本。【原文：The Bank of England is looking at cutting out card payments to reduce retail transaction costs by enabling direct bank transfers or the use of tokenised deposits and stablecoins.】

item.title: OnlyFans正洽谈出售60%股权，公司估值达35亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以成人内容闻名的英国平台OnlyFans正与某投资公司洽谈出售60%股权事宜，该交易将使公司估值达到约35亿美元。【原文：British platform OnlyFans, known best for its adult content, is in talks to sell a 60% stake to an investment firm in a deal that would value the company at about $3.5 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沃什担任主席后，将重点放在达成新的美联储-财政部协议的可能性上
item.description: 随着凯文·沃什的提名，辩论焦点骤然从短期利率转向美联储6.6万亿美元的资产负债表及其在市场中的核心作用。【原文：With the selection of Kevin Warsh, the debate has abruptly shifted from short-term rates to the Fed’s $6.6 trillion balance sheet and its very role in markets.】

item.title: 德文能源与竞争对手页岩钻探商科特拉将达成全股票交易合并
item.description: 科特拉能源公司与德文能源公司将合并组建一家美国页岩油气生产商，企业价值约580亿美元，这是近年来规模最大的石油天然气并购交易之一。【原文：Coterra Energy Inc. and Devon Energy Corp. are combining to create a US shale producer with an enterprise value of about $58 billion, one of the largest oil and natural gas deals in years.】

item.title: OpenAI押注超级碗赛事实现突破
item.description: 初创公司将斥资数百万美元在比赛期间投放广告，以展示其人工智能工具。【原文：Startup will spend millions for an ad during the game to show off its AI tools】

item.title: 泰森食品因牛肉定价策略与禽肉需求增长，利润超预期
item.description: 泰森食品公司公布的第一季度财报略超分析师预期，因牛肉价格上涨及持续的鸡肉需求抵消了牛源供应紧张带来的压力。【原文：Tyson Foods Inc. reported first-quarter earnings that slightly beat analyst estimates as higher beef pricing and continued chicken demand offset pressure from limited cattle supplies.】

item.description: 第二任期效应之一：首次人口下降迫在眉睫【原文：First population decline looms as one effect of second term】

item.title: 评级购物兴起之际，晨星在加拿大占据主导地位
item.description: 多年来，在加拿大债券市场，一家信用评级机构始终为企业借款人授予最优评级：晨星DBRS。其评级平均比标准普尔全球评级、穆迪评级和惠誉评级高出整整一级。【原文：For years, one credit-ratings firm has handed out the most favorable grades to corporate borrowers in the Canadian bond market: Morningstar DBRS. On average, its ratings are one full notch higher than those assigned by S&P Global Ratings, Moody’s Ratings and Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 泰克梅里昂从布雷文·霍华德分拆，携10亿美元对冲基金独立运营
item.description: 泰克梅里昂资本管理公司正将其宏观对冲基金从布雷文霍华德资产管理公司剥离，该基金获得超过10亿美元的承诺资金，包括创始投资者迈克尔·诺沃格拉茨和艾伦·霍华德的持续支持。【原文：Tekmerion Capital Management is spinning out its macro hedge fund from Brevan Howard Asset Management with commitments of more than $1 billion, including continued support from initial backers Michael Novogratz and Alan Howard.】

item.title: 帕兰蒂尔财报发布之际，其股价正亟需利好消息提振
item.description: 帕兰蒂尔科技公司股价时隔两年首次未能在季度财报发布前上涨——这表明投资者正逐渐失去抢购该股的动力，而该股已成为标普500指数中估值最高的股票之一。【原文：For the first time in two years, Palantir Technologies Inc. shares are not rallying into a quarterly earnings report — a signal that investors are finding fewer reasons to snap up what has become one of the most expensive stocks in the S&P 500 Index.】

item.title: 智利经济活动以强劲月度增长结束2025年
item.description: 智利经济活动在12月出现反弹。这份报告发布于央行将利率维持在2022年以来最低水平数日之后，央行表示临时性因素拖累了经济增长。【原文：Chile’s economic activity bounced back in December in a report published days after the central bank held its interest rate at the lowest level since 2022 and said temporary factors had dragged on growth.】

item.title: SpaceX正就与xAI合并进行深入谈判
item.description: 知情人士透露，埃隆·马斯克正就合并SpaceX与xAI进行深入谈判，这位亿万富翁正迅速推进其商业帝国的整合进程。【原文：Elon Musk is in advanced talks to combine SpaceX with xAI, according to people familiar with the matter, as the billionaire moves quickly to consolidate his empire.】

item.title: Onyx在纽约开设新办事处，并聘请Sheil作为最新扩张举措
item.description: 能源与大宗商品做市商奥尼克斯资本集团在纽约开设办事处，并聘请资深人士担任负责人，作为其持续扩张计划的一部分。【原文：Onyx Capital Group, the energy and commodities market maker, has opened an office in New York and hired a veteran to lead it as part of its continued expansion.】

item.title: 特斯拉在法国销量跌至三年新低，挪威销量暴跌88%
item.description: 特斯拉公司在欧洲的销售低迷态势延续至新年，在该地区两大领先的电池电动汽车市场，其注册量均出现断崖式下跌。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s European sales slump carried over into the new year, with registrations plummeting in two of the region’s leading markets for battery-electric vehicles.】

item.title: 交易商密切关注贝森特任何债务出售动向以抑制收益率
item.description: 债券市场参与者普遍认为，美国财政部在周三的关键声明中不会对债务发行计划作出重大调整。不过，特朗普政府在其他领域采取的激进财政举措，已使投资者保持警惕，防范任何压低收益率的意外举措。【原文：Bond market participants widely see the US Treasury refraining from any major shift in debt-issuance plans in a key statement Wednesday, though the Trump administration’s aggressive financial maneuvers elsewhere have put investors on watch for any surprise move to hold down yields.】

item.title: 智利投资者预期三月降息及收益率曲线陡峭化
item.description: 投资者押注智利货币当局将在3月下次政策会议上降息25个基点，此时距离新政府上台仅两周——该政府已承诺重振经济增长。【原文：Investors are betting Chile’s monetary authority will reduce interest rates by a quarter-point at the next policy meeting in March, two weeks after a new government comes to power that has pledged to reinvigorate economic growth.】

item.title: 高盛分析师斯奈德称美国企业盈利预测表现强劲
item.description: 高盛集团策略师指出，美国企业2026年的盈利前景依然稳健，这缓解了市场对当前财报季表现欠佳的担忧。【原文：Corporate America’s earnings outlook for 2026 remains solid, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists, assuaging concerns after an underwhelming reporting season so far.】
